Class AppForTests

Namespace
Booseapptest
Assembly
Booseapptest.dll

Unit tests for the AppFor command: verifies initial execution sets the loop variable correctly and that subsequent iterations increment the loop variable as expected.

[TestClass]
public class AppForTests

Methods

AppFor_InitialExecute_SetsLoopVarToStart()

Ensures that the first Execute() call initializes the loop variable to the specified start value, sets the loop condition to true when within range, and does not modify the program counter when the loop should continue.

[TestMethod]
public void AppFor_InitialExecute_SetsLoopVarToStart()

AppFor_NextIteration_IncrementsLoopVar()

Ensures that calling NextIteration() advances the loop variable by the configured step value after initialization.

[TestMethod]
public void AppFor_NextIteration_IncrementsLoopVar()
